Name: Coptic textile
Description: A fragment of decorative band in linen and wool. The motif consists of a series of stepped chevrons in natural, red, pink, yellow, indigo and green.Technique: tapestry with built-up shapes and slits.Ends per inch (warp threads): 40 over ground, 18 over tapestry.Picks per inch (weft threads): 52 over ground, 96 over tapestry.
